title: Ghoul - 3 albums - [metal][mp3]
description:
Three albums by horror-metal band, Ghoul. Not quite a complete discography I&#039;m afraid. I&#039;ve heard their sound described as "Carcass jamming with The Gruesomes" but check out the band website for more info http://www.creepsylvania.com/.
